title: "your were unable to log in because u may be offline"
body:

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) for me, I'd also recommend switching over to a wired connection as WiFi is known to be unreliable.
